meanings.definition: A single-celled organism that is classified as a eukaryote and can move independently.
meanings.sent1: Protozoans are tiny creatures that can move on their own.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study protozoans to learn more about single-celled organisms.
meanings.sent3: The protozoans had a race to see who could move the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, protozoans are the kings of mobility.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, protozoans look like tiny, wiggling dots.

meanings.definition: Any member of the phylum Protozoa, including amoebas, flagellates, ciliates, and sporozoans.
meanings.sent1: Protozoans such as amoebas and flagellates are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: The pond water was teeming with various types of protozoans.
meanings.sent3: At the protozoan party, the amoeba was the life of the gathering.
meanings.sent4: In the microscopic world, protozoans reign supreme as diverse beings.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of protozoans in nature is truly remarkable.
